I have the same problem as THOR4, and it's not the av's fault, because I even added the exe and the updater to the Trusted list. My pc can run this game, but I can't figure out the problema, if anyone can help it would be much apreciated.
everything is working except for the in game music how do i fix that

its the file injection what sometimes gets blocked as some avs class it as suspicious activity so adding the game .exe to trusted list wont work. your av should be disabled or the whole folder needs to be in the trusted list.

@gansuk
